700394f-a.title: Bronx: Adams Street - Van Nest Avenue
700394f-a.text:
Adams Street, north side, between Van Nest and E. Tremont
Avenues. The view is northwestward.
April 16, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
700394f-a.folder: Adams Street & Van Nest Avenue, Bronx, NY

700392f-a.title: Bronx: Adams Street - Van Nest Avenue
700392f-a.text:
(1)
1722 to 1738 (right to left) Adams Street, north side, between
Van Nest and Morris Park Aves. In the center right, at No. 1724, is
St. Luke's Lutheran Church. The view is northward across an empty
1ot on the south side of the street.
July 31, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
A closer view of the church and sone of the houses.
July 31, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(3)
The same as view 1, ten years later. The view is westward, and
shows the church on the extreme right.
April 16, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
700392f-a.folder: Adams Street & Van Nest Avenue, Bronx, NY
